title: Zelha Tunc Pekkan Progress Journal
text:
Introduction

This progress journal covers Zelha Tunc Pekkan’s work during their term at BDA 503 Fall 2023.
Each section is an assignment or an individual work.

title: 2  inclass1: Calculates and Plots PISA data
section: 2.1 My first PISA Math data analysis
text:
2.1 My first PISA Math data analysis
We used PISA 2015 data set https://www.oecd.org/pisa/data/2015database/. This data set is too big and there can easily be an entire class on this data set. The new PISA data will be available on December 5, 2023! Check it out https://pisa2022-maths.oecd.org
Original data is in SPSS format and a conversion function is used.
